5235091/5234651/5236171.text:
My brother William Cahill of Craughatoosane, Listowel made a tambourine out of a goat's skin.  This is the way he made it.  He got the skin of a goat and put it down the glaise for about sil six weeks and he put a grain of lime on it the way there would not be smell and he put a grain of salt in it the way it would not rot.  Then he got the rim of a screen and put the skin on and pulled it well and then got 2d worth of brass tacks and put them on it and then got the covers off of polish boxes and flattened them out and then made holes in the rim.  Then he got the tongs and reddened it and put it into the holes and made them nice and long.  Then he rubbed a small piece of resin to it and it made it very hard.  Then he put it up and let it dry.  Then he put wires along the back of it to make
(continues on next page)

I saw my sister Hannie Cahill, Craughtoosane, LIstowel making a doll out of gold paper.  She got a bit of gold paper and made the top of it roundy and she rounding it till she had it made.



There are many kinds of home-made toys with which we play with in this district.  One of these is a whistler.  We make them with a sop of straw by cutting a hole in the side of it with a blade and blow through it.  This whistler is called "Pipinceocl."  We make a whistler with a horse chesnut by making a small hole in the side of it and

In this way they used to make a hurley.The way they used to make a [?] slitter was they would get corks off of porter bottles and tie them together with a cord. Then they would get cloth and tie it around the corks then when they would come to the end of the cloth they would sew the cloth together and their slitter was made.

The bladder is also used for keeping lard.



How people used to make a kite is to get too pieces of laths and from a cross and then nail them together. Then get a piece of brown paper and glue it over the cross. Leave it dry for about a

People used to put it between there thumbs and blow it and it sounds like "cock-a-doodle-doo."Children used to be making chains out of rushes and necklaces from daisies by making a hole in the daisies and by slipping them through one after another.



My brother often saw Mr. Fitzgerald play a tune with two bones. Mr. Fitzgerald said that two beef bones were the best to play with. He puts his middle finger between the bones and he can play any tune

When the day is rainy children get a match and point out a starting-point and a finish. They all put their matches at the starting-point and the match that reaches the finish first wins the race.To make a "bostoon." People should bruise the skidderywadderies when they are putting them down a person's back. They are small like a grape and coloured red.

Boys a few years ago used slings for killing birds. The way to make a sling:-Get a piece of leather about three inches long and one and a half inches wide. Then double it up. Tie a cord to each end of the leather having one about six inches longer that than the other. You twist the long cord round your finger until the two cords are the same length. Then put a stone in the leather and swing it round until it is in full swing then let go the short cord having the long cord round your finger and you will find that you can shoot it hundreds of yards. The tongue of an old shoe is the best for the piece of leather in a sling.In the country, people

5215813/5215145/5238857.title: Homemade Toys

Boys and girls made a lot of toys long ago. Girls used to make daisy chains which they do always.Girls also used to play jackstones. They got five black round stones and they tossed one stone up in the air. Then while that stone was up in the air they had to gather the other four stones with one hand and be ready to catch the one in the air when it comes down. They used to say this rhyme when they used be playing
(continues on next page)

5008904/4965551/5239021.title: Homemade Toys
5008904/4965551/5239021.text: Some times on a sunny day when I had no other entertainment, I went out to a field or walked along the road side and gathered flowers such as primroses or daisy. When we had sufficient flowers gathered I sat down to make a daisy chain. This was done by means of putting a tiny hole in the stem of the flower and putting another flower through the hole and so on until the chain was long enough. Other times I made a doll. I could make this by tying some rags together by means of a piece of string, this was the doll's body. Then I made the head. To make this I made a little cloth bag and stuffed it with saw-dust. Next I sewed two pieces of cloth and stuffed them with saw-dust and did the same for the legs. Then I made the doll's clothes, these were also made from old cloth which was of no use for anything else. The doll's bed was made from a cardboard box.

5008904/4965552/5239022.title: Homemade Toys
5008904/4965552/5239022.text:
I usually spend my pastime in making toys. My mother taught me how to make a rag doll. First a little bag was made, usually of clean flour bag material. This was stuffed with rags of any description, it was then gathered in at the top and stitched. This was the body. The legs and arms were also made and sewn on to the body. The head was made similarly to the body. Then the eyes were made of blue wool, and the mouth and nose were made of pink wool. The doll was then finished and we made clothes. We preferred this doll to any doll bought in the shop. I often made dolls out of potatoes also. A potato with a small one growing out of it did as the head and body and four sticks stuck into the big potato acted as the legs and arms. I made beds for the dolls out of wooden or cardboard boxes. I dressed them with clothes I also made myself.Making daisy chains was one of my common past time when daisies were easily got. This was done by means of putting the stem of a daisy in through a little slit in the stem of another
(continues on next page)

Once I made a rag doll. How I made her was, I got two pieces of cloth and sewed the sides of them up together. When that was done it formed a bag. I put a bundle of rags into the bag until it got hard. This formed the body. I next got a potato and put a roll of cloth around it. When that was done I drew a face on the front of it with a pen and ink. Then I sewed the head on to the body. I also did the same with the legs and arms as I did with the body. Then I made clothes for the doll. I made a skirt was. I sawed the sides together and hemmed the bottom of it. I also put a little pleat down the front of it which made it look very pretty. I sewed the sides of the blouse and dress also and

I used to make homemade toys when I was younger. Such as the daisy chain. A daisy chain is made be breaking the stems of the daisy's off and then passing a needle and tread through the daisy's from one daisy to another. In this way you can make necklaces and bangles. I also made rag dolls and rag balls. I made a rag doll by getting a piece of rag sewed up in the shape of a bag and then filled it with sawdust. Then by means of a coloured pencil I drew the face. (continues on next page)

My pastime sometimes is making toys. I often made clothes out of old pieces of material for dolls. Sometimes the fitted them well and other times they were to small. Out in the green fields I spent the most of my time making daisychains and garlands for my hair. I got six or seven potatoes and six bits of sticks and I made a doll. In one of the potatoes, I bored two holes for the eyes, and one for the mouth. I often made boxes into cradles for dolls. Sometimes I made motor-cars and lorries. I made them out of carboard.

5008904/4965556/5239026.title: Homemade Toys
5008904/4965556/5239026.text: When I was small, I used to make homemade toys, such as daisy chains, which are made by the means of a straw, and some daisys. I would slip the straw through the hole in the daisies, and it can be worn for a necklace, or a bracelet for your arm. Another of the homemade toys is a strap made out of cigarette paper, that is n the the out-side of the cigarette box. It is made, by folding the paper into long strips, then folded in the centre, until it is an inch long, then one piece of paper is caught into the other, and that is kept on until it is a sufficient length, and it can be worn, for a strap around the waist, or a hair band.

1. A toy gun is made of an elder branch that is hollow in the middle. A piece of a motor tube is placed in the double over one end and tied with a piece of weak wire near the other end. A straight piece of a stick is pulled through the elder until it meets the rubber, then the rubber and the stick are held in one hand and the elder in the other. Then the rubber is strained and and when it is left go it strikes the stick. It will go straight through the elder.A spinning top is made out of a tread spool by making one end in a point and pluging that end with a piece of steel.

5236102/5232186/5241858.text:
There are many customs in my locality such as the making of toys. They make a whistler by cutting a branch off a sycamore tree about half a foot long and stay tapping it until the bark loosens. Then a V shape is cut out of the bark and wood and the bark is taken from the stem. About half an inch is cut off the stem and put at one end of the whistle and another plug is put at the other in which to blow through and that enables it to whistle.An elder gun is made by getting and elder stick about four inches long and scooping the pith out of it. Then get a piece of rubber and tie one end of it to the elder and the other to a stick the same length as the elder. Then put in a stone to the hole in the elder and when you strain the rubber the stick will go through the hole and shoot out the stone.
(continues on next page)

It used to be a customary thing for the people long ago to make tops out of thread spools. Out end of the spool used to be paned and rounded. Then we would cut a natch in it and hole it through the middle and we make whistlers out of them.3. We make bugles out of a stalk of oats. We cut the stalk above the knot and below another one and we cut off a natch in the top of with a knife.

A "yo-yo" is a very easy made toy. All you want is a spool and a round piece of stick. You cut off the ends of the spool and put the stick in each hole at the end of the spool. Then you tie the stick and string together and the "yo-yo" will run up and down the string. Then it is made.
(continues on next page)

5260471/5256378/5275417.title: Homemade Toys
5260471/5256378/5275417.text:
A long time ago boys made their own toys because there were no toy factories.They made yo-yoes out of spools, rolled a piece of cord round them and drew them up and down.Another toy they made was a pegging top. (drawing) Cord was wound round the top and trown on the ground. It spins for nearly ten minutes. Toys were also made for killing birds, one was called a catter pullet and the other was called a slinners. The slinners was made like this.  First of all a piece of leather was shaped half square then a piece of cord was tied out of it. A stone
(continues on next page)

mixes other stuff withs it and gives it to the people to drink.



A lot of home made toys are made round here. A top can be made out of a spool by putting a sharp point on the spool. Then get a piece of iron with a sharp point on it and stick it into the hole in the spool and then the top is made.Another home made toy
(continues on next page)

5260471/5256486/5275572.title: Cures
5260471/5256486/5275572.text:
(continued from previous page)
There is an old cure for chillblains is a roasted onion.



60 years ago girls used to make dolls of rags and straw. First of all they used to sew the rags in the shape of doll and then they stuff it with the straw. There is a bird-trap made like this (drawing) It is a number of sticks
(continues on next page)

There are many toys that boys and girls can make. They can make dolls out of paper. They can make houses out of blocks of timber. They can play marbles and they must have four little holes and they must put the marbles into the little holes. Some children play dax. When it is raining there
(continues on next page)

5260471/5256539/5275628.title: Homemade Toys
5260471/5256539/5275628.text:
The best known toys made long ago are as follows - tops, clay dolls, Jack-knifes, balls and mostly simple things like that, while the more manly toys were - stilts, slings, catapults suckers, and kites.We had a gardener who was clever in the manufacture. One day I asked him what he could make. He said that he used to make stilts suckers, kites, clay dolls, a "arrow" parachute. For his  children at home.I had often made a common parachute using my
(continues on next page)

5260471/5256584/5275728.text:

in them. there was a school in Knockaulin near a small well, which is called St John's. The well is there still and it also has cures.The ruins of an old school and chapel can be seen in Harristown,  beside a holy well. If you go there you have to leave something on the ruins beside the well.



A piece of cycle tube about 14 ins. long and a fo stick like a Y can make a strong "slingers".  Tie the rubber to one side of the stick and then tie another from the otherside. Get a piece of leather and tie the rubber into two holes of it like this. -

Some home-made toys are said to be better than ones you buy. I made a lot of toys by fretwork. I once made a windmill and when you would pull it along the arms would turn around. I made it on a board and put four wheels on it. In one I put a groove round the rim on one wheel and also a groove on the rod holding the arms. I put a piece
(continues on next page)

5275203/5271598/5277425.title: Homemade Toys
5275203/5271598/5277425.text:
There are many people which are able to make some toys and strings from flowers.A flower chain can be made from daisies, and girls are very fond of making them.[Drawing] - Daisy chainA great bunch of daisies are gathered first which are got in the green fertile fields at all month of the year.The a little split is made in the first daisy and the next one is put in through it, and by
(continues on next page)

5275203/5271661/5277452.title: Homemade Toys
5275203/5271661/5277452.text:
Children amuse themselves in many ways. The most delightful way is by making a daisy chain.[Drawing] - daisy chainThis daisy chain is made by a great many daisies knotted together.It is very hard to make a daisy chain because often times it breaks.[Drawing] - a cribIn the snowy months the boys always amuse themselves by making a crib to catch the
(continues on next page)

5275203/5271741/5277560.title: Homemade Toys
5275203/5271741/5277560.text:
Long ago and at the present time children were very much skilled in making toys of different kind[Drawing] - Daisy chain when completedMost of the girls' time is given to making long yellow daisy chains. At first they go out to a green fertile field and gather a bunch of yellow and white coloured daisies. They make a little split in one of the stems and put another stem out through the split. A split is put in that stem then, and another daisy is put out in it. This continues until the chain is long enough.
(continues on next page)

5275203/5271886/5277600.title: Homemade Toys
5275203/5271886/5277600.text:
All small boys, and girls, spend the most of their past-time making some small toys to amuse themselves.[Drawing] - Daisy chainIn Summer nice little daisies can be got in the fields, from which daisy chains can be made. The way to make those chains is, to get a small bunch of daisies, and put them all in on a piece of thread. Beautiful wreaths for graves can be made also from flowers.Spinning tops can
(continues on next page)

5277706/5276729/5277810.title: Homemade Toys
5277706/5276729/5277810.text:
Tops.  Tops can be made from large reels. The hole is blocked with a plug of wood. One side of the reel is pared to a point. A coffin nail is inserted to act as a spear. Pegtops can be made in the same manner. Instead of a coffin nail a long wire nail is used. Lines are then marked around the top with a red hot iron.Boats.  Boats are easily made from wood. All that is needed is a flat piece of wood and a knife. The wood is pared to the shape of a boat. Children find great pleasure in racing them in the stream.Necklace.  A necklace can be made beautifully out of horse-chestnuts. A piece of string is passed through the nuts. The large ones first and so on till it is
(continues on next page)

5215784/5209908/5277883.title: Homemade Toys
5215784/5209908/5277883.text:
In my grand-father's time they used to make wooden spoons for Easter Sunday out of wood. The boys used to make toas out of doab which they got in wet land. It had a brown colour. They used to wet the doab and shape it into toas. Then they used to leave it to dry and it got very hard and they used to play them. We do
(continues on next page)

5215784/5210540/5279100.title: Playing Toys
5215784/5210540/5279100.text: When playing toys you make three holes. Then you stand about a yard from the first one and pink. If you put a marble in the hole you may fling it to the next hole. When you are throwing get the toy in between the thumb and the first finger and shove it out with your thumb. If you do not put it in the hole the next person may throw. Each one has to get the holes three times. The person that gets the third hole first is game.

5275203/5272141/5283503.text:
Toys are made by the children, to amuse themselves.They are made on wet days.Tops are made from spools. A sharp pointed nail is put in the spool, and the children take great deliglight in spinning it round.[Drawing] - Pop gunGuns can be made from alder trees. Long ago when people had no money to buy toys for their children they made their own toys

It was then stopped at one end with a piece of paper, and wind was blown into it, and another piece of paper was put in the other end keeping in the

Long ago all the children made little toys to amuse themselves namely snares, crbs, and pop-guns.[Drawing] - SnareThe things acquired to make a snare, are snare wire, a small, a piece of twine, and a peg.

5275203/5272423/5283602.text:
[Drawing] - Daisy-chainAs the children long ago never saw towns in which to see toys, so they made toys from wood, card-board, and other things at home.The girls made daisy chain for using as necklaces.The way they made them was, a bunch of flowers were picked, then one flower was holed in the stem usually with the thumb-nails, then another flower was put into the hole and another hole made in that stem.
(continues on next page)
